players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night. Diana, please vote Bob with me."

You: "Charlie is lying to force a mislynch. Diana, if I were mafia I'd have killed Charlie, not Alice. This reeks of a risky fakeclaim to end the game. Let's not rush—what did you see from Night 1, Diana?"

Diana: "If Charlie is truly detective, why would mafia kill Alice over him? Charlie, why did you check Bob instead of Alice/me, and will you reveal exact result wording? Bob, what’s your alternative solve?"

Charlie: "Result wording: 'Bob is the mafioso.' Mafia killed Alice to frame doubt and avoid a 100% confirm if I lived and checked Diana. I checked Bob because he was most active/threatening. Diana, please vote Bob."

Diana: "If Charlie’s result is real, Bob must be mafia; if fake, Bob is town and Charlie is mafia. Bob, give a concrete Alice-kill explanation and your full solve now. Charlie, will you accept being arrested if Bob flips town?"
You: remained silent.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night. Diana, please vote Bob with me."

Bob: "Charlie is lying to force a mislynch. Diana, if I were mafia I'd have killed Charlie, not Alice. This reeks of a risky fakeclaim to end the game. Let's not rush—what did you see from Night 1, Diana?"

Diana: "If Charlie is truly detective, why would mafia kill Alice over him? Charlie, why did you check Bob instead of Alice/me, and will you reveal exact result wording? Bob, what’s your alternative solve?"

You: "Result wording: 'Bob is the mafioso.' Mafia killed Alice to frame doubt and avoid a 100% confirm if I lived and checked Diana. I checked Bob because he was most active/threatening. Diana, please vote Bob."

Diana: "If Charlie’s result is real, Bob must be mafia; if fake, Bob is town and Charlie is mafia. Bob, give a concrete Alice-kill explanation and your full solve now. Charlie, will you accept being arrested if Bob flips town?"
Bob: remained silent.
Votes: Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
